comment:
* Writes data about a given speech synthesis request to the event logs. The data that is logged
 * includes the calling app, length of the utterance, speech rate / pitch, the latency, and overall
 * time taken.

methods.name: protected void logSuccess(long audioLatency, long engineLatency, long engineTotal)
private int getUtteranceLength()
methods.comment:
* @return the length of the utterance for the given synthesis, 0
     *          if the utterance was {@code null}.

methods.name: private String getLocaleString()
methods.comment:
* Returns a formatted locale string from the synthesis params of the
     * form lang-country-variant.

methodNames: protected void logSuccess(long audioLatency, long engineLatency, long engineTotal)
